items.title: Ultrasonogram
items.label: Cloud Consultation and Services
items.name: Ultrasonogram
items.fulltext:
It understands your everydayPhilips Affiniti 50 cardiovascular ultrasound system
Affiniti 50 is a complete echocardiography solution that addresses  the needs of a busy department or office while incorporating those  innovations that make Philips ultrasound the global leader in  echocardiography.
You always go above and beyond to provide the best care to your  patients. But you are expected to do so with less time, fewer resources,  and higher patient volume.
To balance these many demands, you need diagnostic information  quickly – but not at the expense of accuracy. You need advanced  functionality – but not...
